message: Let's start with this. A fair split considering the inflation working against me.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, taking into account the inflation. Let's see what you think.
Your offer isn't reasonable considering the faster rate of inflation against my share. I'm willing to compromise, but it needs to be closer to a 2:1 split in my favor.
I'm willing to meet you halfway.  A 45/55 split is closer to your proposal and still accounts for the inflation affecting us both. Let's end this and get the money.
